p: As shown in Table 6a, the total glycosidesâ€™ contents of the leaves and stems of Pandiaka heudelotii were 1196.0 mg/kg dw and 860.6 mg/kg dw, respectively. Thirteen known glycosides were detected including nicotiflorin (53.45% in leaves; 55.35% in stems), clitorin (21.06% in leaves; 19.49% in stems), mauritianin (15.88% in leaves; 16.82% in stems) and amygdalin (9.60% in leaves; 8.34% in stems). The remaining <0.01% consisted of prunasin, indican, ouabain, linamarin, digoxin, lotaustralin, digitoxin, dhurrin and digitalis.
